parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of an Mixed Reality Account.

parameters.name: regenerate
parameters.description: Required information for key regeneration.

serial.description: Serial of key to be regenerated

type.description: Fully qualified resource type which includes provider namespace

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

MixedRealityAccountProperties.description: Common Properties shared by Mixed Reality Accounts

storageAccountName.description: The name of the storage account associated with this accountId

accountDomain.description: Correspond domain name of certain Spatial Anchors Account

plan.description: The plan associated with this account

sku.description: The SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) assigned to this resource.

kind.description: The kind of account, if supported

ObjectAnchorsAccountPage.description: Result of the request to get resource collection. It contains a list of resources and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: The ObjectAnchorsAccount items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

identity.description: The identity associated with this account

plan.description: The plan associated with this account

sku.description: The SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) assigned to this resource.

kind.description: The kind of account, if supported

RemoteRenderingAccountPage.description: Result of the request to get resource collection. It contains a list of resources and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: The RemoteRenderingAccount items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

Serial.description: Serial of key to be regenerated

Sku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

name.description: The name of the SKU. Ex - P3. It is typically a letter+number code

tier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

identity.description: The identity associated with this account

plan.description: The plan associated with this account

sku.description: The SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) assigned to this resource.

kind.description: The kind of account, if supported

SpatialAnchorsAccountPage.description: Result of the request to get resource collection. It contains a list of resources and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: The SpatialAnchorsAccount items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items
